verses.text: \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* take refuge \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*. Deliver \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, save \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H1697"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* pursue \w me|strong="H5921"\w*;

\w or|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H3068"\w* lions \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* tear \w me|strong="H7291"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* pieces, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* rend \w me|strong="H7291"\w*, \w past|strong="H7291"\w* \w hope|strong="H2620"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w rescue|strong="H5337"\w*.

\nd Lord\nd*, \w my|strong="H5337"\w* God, \w if|strong="H6435"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w has|strong="H5315"\w* \w been|strong="H2963"\w* \w such|strong="H5315"\w* \w if|strong="H6435"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* hands \w have|strong="H5337"\w* \w been|strong="H2963"\w* stained \w with|strong="H5315"\w* guilt,

\w if|strong="H3426"\w* friends \w I|strong="H3068"\w* paid back \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w evil|strong="H6213"\w*, \w if|strong="H3426"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* plundered \w my|strong="H3068"\w* foes \w without|strong="H6213"\w* \w cause|strong="H6213"\w*,

may \w the|strong="H7999"\w* \w enemy|strong="H6887"\w* chase \w and|strong="H7451"\w* find \w me|strong="H1580"\w*, trample \w my|strong="H7999"\w* life \w to|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H7999"\w* ground, \w my|strong="H7999"\w* honor leave \w in|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H7999"\w* dirt! \qs Selah\qs*

Arise, \nd Lord\nd*, \w in|strong="H7931"\w* anger, against \w my|strong="H7291"\w* foes rise \w in|strong="H7931"\w* fury. Awake \w for|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H7291"\w* help: \w let|strong="H5315"\w* justice \w be|strong="H5315"\w* done.

Gather \w the|strong="H5375"\w* nations \w about|strong="H5375"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* sit \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w lofty|strong="H5375"\w* throne,

\w as|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* 
d Lord
d*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* judge \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w peoples|strong="H3816"\w*. Judge \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, 
d Lord
d*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* innocence \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* integrity.

\w Put|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* end \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wrong \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wicked, protect \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6664"\w*. Searcher \w of|strong="H3068"\w* hearts \w and|strong="H3068"\w* minds, \w righteous|strong="H6664"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.
God \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w my|strong="H3559"\w* shield: he saves \w the|strong="H3559"\w* upright \w in|strong="H3559"\w* \w heart|strong="H3826"\w*.
God \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w just|strong="H3477"\w* judge, constant \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w righteous|strong="H3477"\w* anger.

\w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H6662"\w* sharpen \w his|strong="H3605"\w* sword \w without|strong="H3117"\w* fail, \w his|strong="H3605"\w* bow \w is|strong="H3117"\w* bent \w and|strong="H3117"\w* ready,

\w his|strong="H7725"\w* deadly \w weapons|strong="H2719"\w* \w are|strong="H7198"\w* \w ready|strong="H3559"\w*, \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w arrows|strong="H7198"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w makes|strong="H3559"\w* \w of|strong="H2719"\w* flame.
\w The|strong="H3559"\w* enemy who conceives evil; pregnant \w with|strong="H3627"\w* mischief, giving birth \w to|strong="H3559"\w* lies,

\w a|strong="H3068"\w* pit \w they|strong="H3205"\w* \w have|strong="H3205"\w* made \w and|strong="H5999"\w* dug; \w but|strong="H2009"\w* into \w the|strong="H3205"\w* hole \w that|strong="H2009"\w* \w they|strong="H3205"\w* made \w they|strong="H3205"\w* \w will|strong="H5999"\w* fall.

\w On|strong="H5307"\w* \w their|strong="H5307"\w* own heads \w their|strong="H5307"\w* mischief comes back; \w on|strong="H5307"\w* \w their|strong="H5307"\w* own skulls \w their|strong="H5307"\w* violence comes \w down|strong="H5307"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w give|strong="H7725"\w* thanks \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* 
d Lord
d* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* justice, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* sing \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* name \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* 
d Lord
d* Most \w High|strong="H7218"\w*.
